nodes.text: Lord Vader Will See You Now

"Lord Vader Will See You Now" is a short story that was published in the 2020 anthology book From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back. It was written by John Jackson Miller and focuses on the actions of Rae Sloane during the Millennium Falcon's attempt to hide from Imperials in the Hoth asteroid field.
